app_descript:
NZ Fishing Rules

Brief: NZ Fishing Rules is an indispensable app for both amateur and seasoned anglers in New Zealand, providing up-to-date information on local fishing regulations to ensure a lawful and sustainable fishing experience. Whether you're planning a leisurely weekend fishing trip or going for the big catch, this app helps you stay informed and compliant with regional rules.
